sub_title: Senior Clinical Contract Manager / Pharmaceutics / Clinical Research / CRO / Interim / Working internationally.
summary:
• hello@leondeleeuw.net 
+359878838624
• www.leondeleeuw.net/resume

Currently at the Netherlands Cancer Institute, composing budgets for phase 1, 2 and 3 oncology studies. Negotiating legal wording in clinical trial agreements, funding agreements and contract amendments.

For Marshall Denning I was a Legal lead for 15 million Euro private sector IT deals and public tenders in Belgium, France and the Netherlands.

For IQVIA I executed clinical contracts with large hospitals and GP sites in the Netherlands in Belgium, mostly for Phase 3b and 4 studies. 

Working abroad and with cross-cultural teams on challenging projects while maintaining high client satisfaction are the red line throughout the functions I'm in. Strong background in international business.

Dutch citizen with EU working rights. Able to relocate globally.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 11408925, 'name': 'Syneos Health', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHBsEZeIFwfmQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519888772014?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=SfpVjEhHMejfjPxFNakhEPAXb2nnISXeBrzscVUrJUY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/syneos-health/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Bulgaria', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Syneos Health', 'description': "• Leading multi-country projects including negotiating and preparing contracts, budgets, and documents for participation in industry-sponsored clinical trials.  
• Administering all contract management processes, including coordination with relevant protocol, informed consent, institution, investigator, vendor, consultant, and customer agreement documents at a project level.
• Working closely with Site Contract Service Center and Legal to harmonize site contract to reflect sponsor's master service agreement terms.
• Working closely with SSU lead, Clinical Operations and Finance to validate the load of departmental budgets and corresponding backlog.
• Providing support to business development and represents site contracts/Site Start-Up (SSU) at internal or customer meetings.
• Working within the forecasted country/site contracting timelines, ensuring they are complied with and tracking milestone progress in agreed upon SSU tracking system in real-time.
• Serving as key communication liaison between site contracts staff and internal and external customers.  Providing functional guidance and keeping internal and external teams aware of all contract statuses or pending issues.
• Training and mentoring less experienced staff members on departmental Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), and ensuring quality of team work products. Maintaining and updating training material for site contract team.
• Actively participating in higher level discussions about overall company goals, departmental objectives, and specific project aims.
• Facilitating the execution of contracts by company signatories.
• Monitoring financial aspects of the project and the number of hours/tasks available per contract; escalating discrepancies in a timely fashion.", 'title': 'Senior Site Contracts Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 8373242, 'name': 'The Netherlands Cancer Institute', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEqz4HPV21a-Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1519888856405?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=6LwviCLR9ot0UlsGa7_yMD8XGO1pCYnLRKV2nECIf6s', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-netherlands-cancer-institute/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, the Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'The Netherlands Cancer Institute', 'description': '• Directly negotiated with pharmaceutical firms and legal representatives;

- budgets for phase 1, 2 and 3 oncology clinical trials and medical device studies. In close contact with finance, the hospital pharmacy, radiology and nuclear medicine departments to include the correct procedures and pricing.
- legal wording in contracts, amendments and confidentiality agreements. Negotiating contract clauses to ensure patient safety, securing confidential patient data.

• Setting up investigator-initiated clinical trials in the Netherlands, Italy and the US; 

- determining, in close collaboration with investigators, the interventions, study cycles, therapy administering and scans that take place.
- composing schedules of assessments, study budgets, drafting funding agreements with local clinics, institutions and universities.
- arranging local monitoring and insurance as per regulatory guidelines. 
- attending meetings with investigators and participating sites to determine study budgets and study start-up.

• Guiding and mentoring colleagues on how to work with tight deadlines, difficulties and logistical challenges with clinical trials and writing contract clauses.', 'title': 'Senior Clinical Contract Manager', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 16250048, 'name': 'Marshall Denning', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHMl1NgXyCyTQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519861701398?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=H5R2ieHl1bltDCvUy5FbcWZlU3q1jSSLQ_YJjuel1w0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/marshall-denning/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'France, Belgium', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Marshall Denning', 'description': '• Legal lead for public tenders and commercial contracts up to the value of 15 million Euros.
• Set up and negotiated contracts and amendments for IT services, cloud migration and consultancy to hospitals and pharmaceutical clients.
• Liaised directly with corporate clients and the business team on the finance, margin and sales forecast to ensure profitability.
• Prepared risk assessments and mitigations to inform teams on commercial and legal implications and to limit risk exposure for the contract under negotiation.
• Drafted non-disclosure agreements, proposals, amendments, extensions and contract clauses for topics such as GDPR, benchmarking, audits, non-compete and non-hire.
• Directly negotiated on contract wording, intellectual property, payment terms, service level agreements, audit and benchmarking clauses and financial terms with high-stake clients.
• Interpreted ongoing contracts, addressing specific concerns from the Business and Delivery teams. Ensured correct signing of new contracts and online archiving for retrieval.
• Advised on dispute resolution and settlement, keeping the balance between business interests and client relationships.
• Wrote client communication, internal escalations and approval requests on behalf of the company lawyer and business teams.', 'title': 'Contract Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 4057, 'name': 'IQVIA', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFW8oSPns4-Cw/company-logo_400_400/0/1678802429083?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=DvqdfvJOexoGS3cONAdQKBpQ9lBaGHNoZJFFZQyq5ck', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/iqvia/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Belgium', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'IQVIA', 'description': '• Managed a team of fifteen start-up specialists / CRA’s during site start-up, followed up and kept track of the submission process and contracting, for phase 3 and 4 clinical studies.
• Handled the grand study budget to determine the country and site budgets. Reviewed site budget requests and decided on acceptance or a counter-proposal to further negotiate.
• Ensured that the Trial Master File was continuously updated with email communication and site visit reports.
• Kept close contact with study sponsors to discuss the identification and selection of sites. Reported on the contract process, site initiation, patient inclusion and monitoring findings.', 'title': 'Regulatory / Study Start-Up Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Belgium', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'IQVIA', 'description': '• Performed site identification, inclusion, contracting, initiation visits, training, monitoring, reporting of protocol deviations, close-out visits and trial master file archiving. 
• Independently executed contracts for studies with all major Dutch and Belgian hospitals, as well as GP practices. Submitted clinical studies for regulatory / ethics committee approval.
• Trained investigators, study coordinators and study nurses on clinical protocols and data registry systems. Mentored junior colleagues on projects.
• Ran vendor management, the creation of purchase orders, invoice proposals with pre-
calculated fees – in order to pay clinical investigators, ethics committees, regulatory authorities payments. Led payment cycles and provided updates on the payment status.', 'title': 'Regulatory / Study Start-Up Specialist / Monitor', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2848937, 'name': 'MSD', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQFOyCKkwPCg2w/company-logo_400_400/0/1688564261568?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=uflMYnNeKLALd8IXUsmmVAFZ71gSVAyFNhvUM9YFpZc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/msd-global/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Bulgaria', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'MSD', 'description': '• Reported and escalated medicine production outages in high detail to avoid production halt.
• Solved Word / Excel / Outlook / Expense report / SAP inquiries of pharma representatives.
• Handled requests by phone, email and chat or through screen sharing.', 'title': 'IT Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}]
